portfolio.title: Movie Finder
portfolio.description: The movie search website I developed using HTML, CSS, and JavaScript allows you to view film ratings, descriptions, and release dates. It offers quick and easy access through its user-friendly interface. This project was designed to showcase my passion for movies and web development skills.
